description:
Rather flat and open descend which also fits for beginners. Surely a nice day when done in combination with Chessiloch.

A lot of pools are just as deep that they can be jumped, but you must be prepared to reach the bottom of it sometimes. A potential 20m jump can be done towards the start. If you park at Kemmeribodenbad, you can add two abseils in the Emme River when going back to the car.

Approach

Exit
